name: tournedos
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick steak (= a slice of meat from a cow) cut from the back of the cow: My tournedos of beef was served with a hot peppercorn sauce. Cook the tournedos one at a time so that the pan isn't too full.
More examplesFewer examplesThe meal included Scottish smoked salmon and tournedos of beef. The tournedos are cut from the narrow end of the fillet.The beef tournedos was wrapped in bacon and served with mashed potatoes.When it's done, flip the tournedos and brown it on the other side.
